program.name: xemacs
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc_r CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" ARGS="--without-gcc --with-dragndrop --with-cde --with-tooltalk" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ARGS="--site-includes=/usr/dt/include" ;; *-hpux11*) # Link against Motif 1.2 to work around bug in Motif 2.1 CC=cc CFLAGS="+O1 -Ae -z +DAportable" ARGS="--without-gcc --with-dragndrop --with-cde --with-tooltalk" X_LIBRARIES="/usr/lib/Motif1.2_R6 -L/usr/lib/X11R6" ARGS="--site-includes=/usr/dt/include" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -Ae -z +DAportable +ESlit +Onofltacc \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ARGS="--without-gcc --with-dragndrop --with-cde --with-tooltalk \ --site-includes=/usr/dt/include --site-libraries=/usr/dt/lib" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O1 -OPT:Olimit=0" ARGS="--without-gcc --with-system-malloc" ;; *-linux*) X_LIBRARIES="/usr/X11R6/lib" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -std -readonly_strings" ARGS="--without-gcc --with-dragndrop --with-cde --with-tooltalk" RUNTIME_LIBS="/usr/dt/lib" ARGS="--site-includes=/usr/dt/include" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CC=gcc CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ARGS="--with-gcc --with-dragndrop --with-cde --with-tooltalk \ --site-includes=/usr/dt/include" RUNTIME_LIBS="/usr/dt/lib /usr/openwin/lib" LDFLAGS="-L/usr/openwin/lib -L/usr/dt/lib" ;; *-solaris2.5.1*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xO2 -xtarget=generic -xarch=v7" ARGS="--without-gcc --with-cde --with-tooltalk \ --site-includes=/usr/dt/include" RUNTIME_LIBS="/usr/dt/lib /usr/openwin/lib" LDFLAGS="-L/usr/openwin/lib -L/usr/dt/lib" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xO2 -xtarget=generic -xarch=v7" ARGS="--without-gcc --with-dragndrop --with-cde --with-tooltalk \ --site-includes=/usr/dt/include" RUNTIME_LIBS="/usr/dt/lib /usr/openwin/lib" LDFLAGS="-L/usr/openwin/lib -L/usr/dt/lib" ;; esac
rm -f config.cache ./configure --cflags="${CFLAGS:--O2}" --compiler="${CC:-gcc}" \ ${LDFLAGS+--ldflags="${LDFLAGS}"} --dynamic=yes --with-pop --with-mule \ --with-database=berkdb --with-site-lisp=yes --with-menubars=lucid \ --with-scrollbars=lucid --error-checking=none --debug=no \ --memory-usage-stats=no --without-modules --with-sound=none \ --with-ncurses --infodir=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/info \ --infopath="/opt/info:${SB_INSTALL_BASE}/info:/usr/local/info:/usr/info:\ ${XEMACSP}/packages/info:${XEMACSP}/xemacs-packages/info" \ --site-prefixes="${SB_VAR_NCURSES} ${SB_VAR_XPM} ${SB_VAR_JPEG} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBTIFF} ${SB_VAR_LIBPNG} ${SB_VAR_ZLIB} ${SB_VAR_LIBDB}" \ --site-runtime-libraries="${SB_VAR_NCURSES_LIB} ${SB_VAR_XPM_LIB} \ ${SB_VAR_JPEG_LIB} ${SB_VAR_LIBTIFF_LIB} ${SB_VAR_LIBPNG_LIB} \ ${SB_VAR_ZLIB_LIB} ${SB_VAR_LIBDB_LIB} \ ${RUNTIME_LIBS+ ${RUNTIME_LIBS}}" \ --package-path="~/.xemacs::\ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/xemacs-${SB_PROG_VER}/mule-packages:\ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/xemacs/mule-packages:\ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/xemacs-${SB_PROG_VER}/xemacs-packages:\ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/xemacs/xemacs-packages:\ ${SB_VAR_XEMACSP}/packages:${SB_VAR_XEMACSP}/xemacs-packages" \ ${X_LIBRARIES+--x-libraries="${X_LIBRARIES}"} \ --with-ldap=no --with-postgresql=no ${ARGS+${ARGS}} \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
program.install:
gmake install
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-hpux10*) # Depot package name not long enough but we don't want to # change package name. ;; *) ${SB_PATH_GINSTALL} -o root -g 0 -m 755 -d ${_docdir} ${SB_PATH_GINSTALL} -m 644 -o root -g 0 man/*.texi man/*/*.texi ${_docdir} ;; esac
# Install all packages ${SB_PATH_GINSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d ${SB_VAR_XEMACSP} ${SB_PATH_GINSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d ${SB_VAR_XEMACSP}/packages (cd ${XEMACSP}; gtar jxf ${SRC_SUMO})
for _bin in ${SB_VAR_XEMACSP}/xemacs-packages/etc/bbdb/*.pl; do sed -e "1 s!/usr/local/bin/perl5!${SB_VAR_PERL}/bin/perl!" \ -e "1 s!/usr/bin/perl!${SB_VAR_PERL}/bin/perl!" \ -e "1 s!/usr/local/bin/perl!${SB_VAR_PERL}/bin/perl!" ${_bin} >/tmp/$$ cp /tmp/$$ ${_bin}; rm -f /tmp/$$ done
chown -hR 0:0 ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib ${SB_VAR_XEMACSP}/xemacs-packages

note.para: Lisp packages found in ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/xemacs/site-lisp will be loaded before lisp packages found in any other directory. This is the location to place customizations to the XEmacs environment. The following packages are automatically loaded on startup: leim-list.el, site-start.el, default.el.
The default path for 3rd-party lisp libraries is:

item.para: ${SB_INSTALL_BASE}/xemacs214p/packages
${SB_INSTALL_BASE}/xemacs214p/xemacs-packages

note.para: The ${SB_INSTALL_BASE}/xemacs214p/xemacs-packages path consists of packages from the sumo tarball provided by xemacs.org and the ${SB_INSTALL_BASE}/xemacs214p/packages path consists of packages we build.
